page.title: 11Middleclass house Shawlands
page.content: House at 82 Durward Avenue. Red sandstone mid-terrace with dormer windows and slate roof. Built early 20th. century. Consists of five principal rooms,2 public rooms,3 bedrooms plus bathroom and fitted kitchen. The bathroom has a shower. The dwelling has gas central heating and is double glazed. To the rear is a detached stone built single garage and an access lane. There is a garden both front and rear. Among the household appliances are, washing machine, tumble drier, micro-wave oven, freezer,home computer,colour T.V., stereo unit and telephone. The property's ratable value is Â£946 per annum and its market value is approx Â£44,000.
